INSERT INTO sj_job_summary (namespace_id, group_name, business_id, trigger_at, system_task_type, success_num,fail_num,fail_reason,stop_num,stop_reason, cancel_num,cancel_reason)
SELECT #{item.namespaceId}, #{item.groupName}, #{item.businessId}, #{item.triggerAt}, #{item.systemTaskType}, #{item.successNum}, #{item.failNum}, #{item.failReason}, #{item.stopNum}, #{item.stopReason}, #{item.cancelNum}, #{item.cancelReason} FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT createDt, NVL(SUM(success_num), 0) AS success, NVL(SUM(fail_num), 0) AS failNum, NVL(SUM(stop_num), 0) AS stop, NVL(SUM(cancel_num), 0) AS cancel, NVL(SUM(fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS fail, NVL(SUM(success_num + fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS total FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(trigger_at, #{dateFormat}) AS createDt, success_num, fail_num, stop_num, cancel_num FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment} ) GROUP BY createDt

SELECT NVL(sum(success_num), 0) AS successNum, NVL(sum(stop_num), 0) AS stopNum, NVL(sum(cancel_num), 0) AS cancelNum, NVL(sum(fail_num), 0) AS failNum, NVL(sum(success_num + fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS totalNum FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
group_name || '/' || (SELECT job_name FROM sj_job WHERE id = business_id) AS name,
group_name || '/' || (SELECT workflow_name FROM sj_workflow WHERE id = business_id) AS name,
SUM(fail_num) AS total FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment} HAVING SUM(fail_num) > 0 ORDER BY total DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
